metadata.title: CVE-2022-30599 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in moodle where an SQL injection risk was identified inBadges code relating to configuring criteria.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
